summary: High-yield passive income strategies optimized for a $95k income earner with limited active hours (12h night shift). Focus is on 'set and forget' DeFi protocols, tokenized real-world assets (RWAs), and automated digital commerce.

opportunities.details: Providing liquidity to 3pool or similar stablecoin pools. Boosted yields via Convex Finance. Minimal impermanent loss risk as assets are pegged.
On-chain exposure to US Treasuries. Highly defensive strategy suitable for preserving capital while earning better-than-bank rates.
Stake ETH to earn rewards while retaining liquidity. Use stETH as collateral in Aave to borrow stablecoins for further yield farming (Looping), though this increases risk.
Create specific guides relevant to night shift lifestyle (e.g., 'Biohacking the Night Shift', 'Sleep Optimization for Nurses'). Market via automated social scheduling.
opportunities.action_required: Upfront creation time (20h), then automated sales

risk_assessment.defi_smart_contract: Medium. Diversify across battle-tested protocols (Curve, Aave) to mitigate single-point failure.
risk_assessment.stablecoin_depeg: Low to Medium. Stick to major stables (USDC, USDT, DAI). Avoid algorithmic stables for this portfolio.
risk_assessment.regulatory: Low for personal holding, but keep tax records for all DeFi transactions.
